page.title: 08NICOLA'S SUNDAY
page.content: We stay at our Nan's on Sunday's. I wait until my Nan gets up before I come down for breakfast in my nightclothes. After breakfast I get dressed and we all listen to the Les Ross show on the Radio. He puts families in contact with each other by telephone. My Nan always listens out in case her name is mentioned. She would love to speak to Uncle Mervin in Australia. I usually take Jess, Nan's dog out for a walk before our Sunday roast and rice pudding. While Nan watches television after lunch I take Jess out for another walk around the local shops. When it's time for tea, Nan puts bread and butter on the table so we can make our own sandwiches, after which it's time for a bath.
